text:
Campsites.co.uk | Haywards Heath, Sussex, UK | ONSITE | Full stack developer

We're a new camping and glamping search engine in the UK. It's an exciting time for us - and could be for you too.

We're looking for a coder with an eye for design to join us and play a big role on the http://www.campsites.co.uk/ website, our api, iOS app, etc.

Our tech is C#, Objective C, and T-SQL.

Our offices are less than a 5 minute walk from Haywards Heath train station with a direct train from Brighton taking 20 minutes.

Full time, part time and interns welcome. No visas, sorry. Impressive portfolios a must.

Email jobs@campsites.co.uk for more details. No agencies or headhunters.
